alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:01PM EDT until August 07 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dorchester County in southeastern Maryland... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 701 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Romancoke to Tilghman Island to Breezy Point, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... University Of Maryland Center For Environmental Studies around 730 PM EDT. Cambridge around 735 PM EDT. Secretary around 740 PM EDT. Hurlock around 745 PM EDT. Federalsburg around 750 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Galestown, Madison, Brookview, Eldorado, Woolford, Hudson, East New Market, Church Creek, Bucktown, and Linkwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
